scripts.stage-vuelta-all: node -e "const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); const y=process.env.npm_config_year||new Date().getFullYear(); for(let s=1;s<=21;s++){ const r=spawnSync(process.execPath,['getStageResult.js','--race','vuelta-a-espana','--stage',String(s),'--year',String(y)],{stdio:'inherit'}); if(r.status!==0) process.exit(r.status||1); }"
scripts.stage-tour-all: node -e "const {spawnSync}=require('child_process'); const y=process.env.npm_config_year||new Date().getFullYear(); for(let s=1;s<=21;s++){ const r=spawnSync(process.execPath,['getStageResult.js','--race','tour-de-france','--stage',String(s),'--year',String(y)],{stdio:'inherit'}); if(r.status!==0) process.exit(r.status||1); }"
